	10


		
Project description

Union Bank of California (Mitsubishi Bank) is one of the biggest banks in California, USA. Global Zaimu End User System (Global ZEUS), which accomplishes several goals for MUB’s parent. Primarily, the system facilitates agile and appropriate decision making processes for bank senior executives related to liquidity and credit risk management. This project is the result of an initiative from Head Office (“HO”). In line with regulatory considerations, the project seeks to conduct necessary system developments in order for MUFG to provision bank liquidity and credit risk data to the Global ZEUS application.
Role & Responsibilities:-
· Involved in full development cycle of Planning, Analysis, Design, Development, Testing and Implementation. 
· Performing root cause analysis and identify and implement corrective and preventive measures and document it.
· Prepared UNIX scripts to run load and automate it. Error handling is done at each level in UNIX scripts.
· Participated in UAT data load. During UAT document performance, data load timings and validations at various levels.
· Optimizing/Tuning mappings for better performance and efficiency.
· Extensively used Transformations like Aggregator, Router, Joiner, Expression, Lookup, Update Strategy, and Sequence Generator. Validating Mapping, Sessions and workflows.
· Developed and maintained PL/SQL scripts and stored procedures.
· Experienced GPG, GIS, autosys, IDQ, DV, Greenplum DB. Automation and scheduling jobs.
· Maintained standards defined at the project level based on the customer across the entire environment.
· Good knowledge on Linux/Unix commands.
· Worked on Autosys tool (CA Workload) for scheduling jobs.

Project #5: -						Nov 2013 – Nov 2014
	Project Name
	GE Aircrafts

	Client
	General Electric

	Environment/Software
	UNIX, Oracle DB, Informatica Power Center, Informatica Developer, Toad

	Role
	ETL developer/ Informatica Developer

	Team Size
	12



Project Description:-
The purpose of this project is to implement a solution that will enable the GEAE Platform Management and Contract Program Managers to accurately assess Spares Financial statistics by platform, model and Customer Type. The reports are to be setup in a drill-down structure starting with a GEES Platform scorecard. The next level of detail is a Family scorecard followed by Model Scorecards with detail graphs and tables. The whole ETL work is done using Informatica.
Role & Responsibilities: -
· Familiarize the team with the customer needs, specifications, design targets, the development process, design standards, techniques and tools to support task performance.
· Developing the ETL mappings, sessions and workflows by following standards and specifications.
· Used Filter, Router and Expression a lot while creating mappings.
· Implemented SCD1. Created Mapplets, reusable transformations and used them in different mappings.
· Control, Decision, Session in the workflow manager.
· Participated in UAT data load. During UAT document performance, data load timings and validations at various levels.
· Testing the data by considering all possible different scenarios and done reports Validations.
· Developed and maintained PL/SQL scripts and stored procedures.
